Subject: EPP Capabilities for Monitoring/Blocking Specific Transfer Scenarios
Description: Hello team, I would like to ask if the EPP tool has the ability to monitor or block the following types of transfers: 1: When the following command is executed: curl --upload-file file.zip https://transfer.sh/file.zip 2: Through a custom file server using SOCKS5 3: RDP channels 4: SSH tunnels Can you please confirm that the EPP can handle and block/monitor these transfer scenarios? Thank you!
What_We_Know__c: The customer asked if EPP has the ability to monitor or block the following types of transfers: 1: When the following command is executed: curl --upload-file file.zip https://transfer.sh/file.zip 2: Through a custom file server using SOCKS5 3: RDP channels 4: SSH tunnels
Next_Steps__c:
Checking with R&D if the transfers can be monitored.

I sent the customer the response for each of the transfer type
Solution_Comment__c: The customers asked about the possibility to block specific exit points.
